title: SD Podcast Number 17 - William Walters; Drone Strikes, dingpolitik and beyond: Furthering the debate on materiality and security
description: Podcast 17: Security Dialogue podcast with William Walters, author of ‘Drone strikes, dingpolitik and beyond: Furthering the debate on materiality and security’. Hosted by Claudia Aradau. From dingpolitik to controversies, and from the contributions of STS to security analysis to the limits of STS-inspired approaches, William addresses key questions about politics, security, and method.
